title: Glo - Engjateigur
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Raw, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Quick service cafe with a few locations in Iceland. Each day has a rotating option menu with raw, vegan, vegetarian, and a chicken dish. Has raw as well vegan sweets, and you get complimentary, refillable hummus. Choose your items, pay at the counter, then find a seat. Free Wi-Fi for 2 hours. At the location of the now defunct A Naestu Grosum restaurant.
